author: hwright
msg: Error if the copy or move API is called with multiple sources, but with
*_as_child flag not set.  It is nonsensical to attempt to copy multiple
files without copying them as children of a destination.  cp/mv error out,
(svn_client_copy4, svn_client_move5):  Passing more than one source with
the *_as_child flag set to false is an API violation.  Check for this
(svn_client_copy4, svn_client_move5):  Update documentation to reflect the

author: dlr
msg: (check_log_chain): Improve error message output when a log's line

author: dlr
msg: (parse_log_output): Set 'revision' field for items in the return
value to a numeric value (as promised by the doc string), instead
of a string representation of a numeric value.  Remove excess
parenthesis around the value used in the assignment of local
variable "lines".  Update extremely out-of-date TODO comment.
(check_log_chain): Remove now-unnecessary use of int() around access
to the 'revision' field of a log item.  Improve clarity of inline

author: ehu
msg: ra_dav-refactoring: Cancellation for arbitrary response body readers as well
as wrapped XML parsers. Also introduce automatic error marshalling in the
(svn_ra_dav__xml_parser_create): Since we'll be using the parser
with the request anyway, register it automatically. Take the extra
required ne_accept_response parameter to do so.
which worries about errors and cancellation.
wrapper_reader_cb): Change to make the parser wrapper support cancellation.
(parsed_request): Change to support the new svn_ra_dav__xml_parser_create()

get_file_reader): Change function signature to svn_ra_dav__block_reader;
